name: mack-link
description: A personal URL shortener built with Cloudflare Workers and React

scripts.dev:ai: concurrently "npm -w worker run dev:ai" "VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:8787 VITE_AUTH_DISABLED=true npm -w admin run dev"
scripts.dev:mobile:ai: VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:8787 VITE_AUTH_DISABLED=true npm -w mobile run dev
scripts.test:ci: npm run ci:build && npm run validate:prod
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm -w worker run clean || true && rm -f worker/src/admin-assets.js && rm -rf worker/.wrangler && rm -rf admin/dist
scripts.lint: npm -w admin run lint && npm -w mobile run lint
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && echo 'All linting completed'
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && npm -w worker exec npm audit --audit-level=moderate || true && npm -w admin exec npm audit --audit-level=moderate || true
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix || true && npm -w worker exec npm audit fix || true && npm -w admin exec npm audit fix || true
scripts.maintenance: npm run security:audit && npm run ci:build && npm run validate:prod
scripts.db:reconcile:analytics:local: npm -w worker exec wrangler d1 execute mack-link --file src/migrate-analytics.sql --local
scripts.db:reconcile:analytics:prod: npm -w worker exec wrangler d1 execute mack-link --file src/migrate-analytics.sql --remote
scripts.db:q:local: npm -w worker exec wrangler d1 execute mack-link --local --command "$npm_config_sql"
scripts.db:q:prod: npm -w worker exec wrangler d1 execute mack-link --remote --command "$npm_config_sql"
scripts.logs:analytics: npm -w worker exec wrangler tail --format pretty | grep -i "analytics"
scripts.logs:errors: npm -w worker exec wrangler tail --format pretty | grep -E "(Analytics.*failed|statement.*failed|error|exception)"
scripts.secrets:put: npm -w worker exec wrangler secret put $npm_config_name
scripts.ci:build: npm ci && npm run lint:all && npm run build
scripts.ci:test: npm run ci:build && npm run validate:prod

author: SpyicyDev
